Important Note about Morx's Storyline
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Important Note about Morx's Storyline
By Azulazulazula on Friday, March 29, 2013 - 03:27 pm:

Recently, I was playing to evolve my hare and zuum into Kalaragi subbreeds (it worked on both, too! I'd never seen the Kalaragi zuum, so yayyyyy!) and had not yet played out the Kalaragi storyline, which naturally grabbed my attention due to the whole Gadamon buggy thing. However, when I went there, I noticed that the story wasn't triggering, so I tried to figure out if I started a story in one of my other regions (Takrama and Morx). I had just started in Takrama and had finished Morx...or so I thought. Today, I remembered that Mosha had just mentioned Bragma to me in Morx, but I hadn't finished out that little segment of MR3 history yet. So I went back and finished that off, and now I'm in Goat, starting the beginning of the Kai/Jenna/Dagga/Joker storyline. In other words, if you start the story about Bragma and his love letters to Mosha, you have to finish it before anything will trigger in other regions. Just FYI.
